desc_content.paragraph: Simplify F-Curves by removing closely spaced keyframes

list_item.paragraph: threshold (float in [0, inf], (optional)) – Threshold
channels (boolean, (optional)) – Channels

desc_content.paragraph: Select keyframes by clicking on them

list_item.paragraph: extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend Select, Toggle keyframe selection instead of leaving newly selected keyframes only
column (boolean, (optional)) – Column Select, Select all keyframes that occur on the same frame as the one under the mouse
channel (boolean, (optional)) – Only Channel, Select all the keyframes in the channel under the mouse

desc_content.paragraph: Copy selected keyframes to the copy/paste buffer
Remove all selected keyframes
Make a copy of all selected keyframes
Make a copy of all selected keyframes and move them

list_item.paragraph: ACTION_OT_duplicate (ACTION_OT_duplicate, (optional)) – Duplicate Keyframes, Make a copy of all selected keyframes
TRANSFORM_OT_transform (TRANSFORM_OT_transform, (optional)) – Transform, Transform selected items by mode type

desc_content.paragraph: Set extrapolation mode for selected F-Curves

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['CONSTANT', 'LINEAR', 'MAKE_CYCLIC', 'CLEAR_CYCLIC'], (optional)) – TypeCONSTANT Constant Extrapolation, Values on endpoint keyframes are held.LINEAR Linear Extrapolation, Straight-line slope of end segments are extended past the endpoint keyframes.MAKE_CYCLIC Make Cyclic (F-Modifier), Add Cycles F-Modifier if one doesn’t exist already.CLEAR_CYCLIC Clear Cyclic (F-Modifier), Remove Cycles F-Modifier if not needed anymore.

desc_content.paragraph: Set the current frame to the average frame value of selected keyframes
Set type of handle for selected keyframes

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['FREE', 'ALIGNED', 'VECTOR', 'AUTO', 'AUTO_CLAMPED'], (optional)) – TypeFREE Free, Completely independent manually set handle.ALIGNED Aligned, Manually set handle with rotation locked together with its pair.VECTOR Vector, Automatic handles that create straight lines.AUTO Automatic, Automatic handles that create smooth curves.AUTO_CLAMPED Auto Clamped, Automatic handles that create smooth curves which only change direction at keyframes.

desc_content.paragraph: Set interpolation mode for the F-Curve segments starting from the selected keyframes

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['CONSTANT', 'LINEAR', 'BEZIER', 'SINE', 'QUAD', 'CUBIC', 'QUART', 'QUINT', 'EXPO', 'CIRC', 'BACK', 'BOUNCE', 'ELASTIC'], (optional)) – TypeCONSTANT Constant, No interpolation, value of A gets held until B is encountered.LINEAR Linear, Straight-line interpolation between A and B (i.e. no ease in/out).BEZIER Bezier, Smooth interpolation between A and B, with some control over curve shape.SINE Sinusoidal, Sinusoidal easing (weakest, almost linear but with a slight curvature).QUAD Quadratic, Quadratic easing.CUBIC Cubic, Cubic easing.QUART Quartic, Quartic easing.QUINT Quintic, Quintic easing.EXPO Exponential, Exponential easing (dramatic).CIRC Circular, Circular easing (strongest and most dynamic).BACK Back, Cubic easing with overshoot and settle.BOUNCE Bounce, Exponentially decaying parabolic bounce, like when objects collide.ELASTIC Elastic, Exponentially decaying sine wave, like an elastic band.

desc_content.paragraph: Insert keyframes for the specified channels
Set type of keyframe for the selected keyframes

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['KEYFRAME', 'BREAKDOWN', 'MOVING_HOLD', 'EXTREME', 'JITTER'], (optional)) – TypeKEYFRAME Keyframe, Normal keyframe - e.g. for key poses.BREAKDOWN Breakdown, A breakdown pose - e.g. for transitions between key poses.MOVING_HOLD Moving Hold, A keyframe that is part of a moving hold.EXTREME Extreme, An ‘extreme’ pose, or some other purpose as needed.JITTER Jitter, A filler or baked keyframe for keying on ones, or some other purpose as needed.

desc_content.paragraph: Switch to editing action in animation layer above the current action in the NLA Stack
Switch to editing action in animation layer below the current action in the NLA Stack
Move selected scene markers to the active Action as local ‘pose’ markers
Flip selected keyframes over the selected mirror line

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['CFRA', 'XAXIS', 'MARKER'], (optional)) – TypeCFRA By Times over Current frame, Flip times of selected keyframes using the current frame as the mirror line.XAXIS By Values over Value=0, Flip values of selected keyframes (i.e. negative values become positive, and vice versa).MARKER By Times over First Selected Marker, Flip times of selected keyframes using the first selected marker as the reference point.

desc_content.paragraph: Create new action
Paste keyframes from copy/paste buffer for the selected channels, starting on the current frame

list_item.paragraph: offset (enum in ['START', 'END', 'RELATIVE', 'NONE'], (optional)) – Offset, Paste time offset of keysSTART Frame Start, Paste keys starting at current frame.END Frame End, Paste keys ending at current frame.RELATIVE Frame Relative, Paste keys relative to the current frame when copying.NONE No Offset, Paste keys from original time.

merge (enum in ['MIX', 'OVER_ALL', 'OVER_RANGE', 'OVER_RANGE_ALL'], (optional)) – Type, Method of merging pasted keys and existingMIX Mix, Overlay existing with new keys.OVER_ALL Overwrite All, Replace all keys.OVER_RANGE Overwrite Range, Overwrite keys in pasted range.OVER_RANGE_ALL Overwrite Entire Range, Overwrite keys in pasted range, using the range of all copied keys.
flipped (boolean, (optional)) – Flipped, Paste keyframes from mirrored bones if they exist

desc_content.paragraph: Set Preview Range based on extents of selected Keyframes
Toggle the properties region visibility
Push action down on to the NLA stack as a new strip
Add keyframes on every frame between the selected keyframes
Toggle selection of all keyframes

field_body.paragraph: action (enum in ['TOGGLE', 'SELECT', 'DESELECT', 'INVERT'], (optional)) – Action, Selection action to executeTOGGLE Toggle, Toggle selection for all elements.SELECT Select, Select all elements.DESELECT Deselect, Deselect all elements.INVERT Invert, Invert selection of all elements.

desc_content.paragraph: Select all keyframes within the specified region

list_item.paragraph: xmin (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – X Min
xmax (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – X Max
ymin (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Y Min
ymax (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Y Max
deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Deselect rather than select items
extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first
axis_range (boolean, (optional)) – Axis Range

desc_content.paragraph: Select keyframe points using circle selection

list_item.paragraph: x (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – X
y (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Y
radius (int in [1, inf], (optional)) – Radius
deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Deselect rather than select items

desc_content.paragraph: Select all keyframes on the specified frame(s)
Select keyframe points using lasso selection

list_item.paragraph: path (bpy_prop_collection of OperatorMousePath, (optional)) – Path
deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Deselect rather than select items
extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first

desc_content.paragraph: Select keyframes to the left or the right of the current frame

list_item.paragraph: mode (enum in ['CHECK', 'LEFT', 'RIGHT'], (optional)) – Mode
extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend Select

desc_content.paragraph: Deselect keyframes on ends of selection islands
Select keyframes occurring in the same F-Curves as selected ones
Select keyframes beside already selected ones
Snap selected keyframes to the times specified

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['CFRA', 'NEAREST_FRAME', 'NEAREST_SECOND', 'NEAREST_MARKER'], (optional)) – TypeCFRA Current frame, Snap selected keyframes to the current frame.NEAREST_FRAME Nearest Frame, Snap selected keyframes to the nearest (whole) frame (use to fix accidental sub-frame offsets).NEAREST_SECOND Nearest Second, Snap selected keyframes to the nearest second.NEAREST_MARKER Nearest Marker, Snap selected keyframes to the nearest marker.

desc_content.paragraph: Store this action in the NLA stack as a non-contributing strip for later use

field_body.paragraph: create_new (boolean, (optional)) – Create New Action, Create a new action once the existing one has been safely stored

desc_content.paragraph: Store this action in the NLA stack as a non-contributing strip for later use, and create a new action
Unlink this action from the active action slot (and/or exit Tweak Mode)

field_body.paragraph: force_delete (boolean, (optional)) – Force Delete, Clear Fake User and remove copy stashed in this data-block’s NLA stack

desc_content.paragraph: Reset viewable area to show full keyframe range
Reset viewable area to show range around current frame
Reset viewable area to show selected keyframes range
